chunk:
Be Green Bath & Body Day Cream for Sensitive/Combination Skin

Brand: Be Green Bath & Body

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Distilled Water), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Zinc Oxide, Lactobacillus Ferment, Cetyl Alcoho
book: 0491-Be Green Bath & Body Day Cream for Sensitive Combination Skin

chunk:
erment, Cetyl Alcohol, Maranta Arundincea (Arrowroot) Powder, Sodium Phytate, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid.

Directions: Using clean hands, scoop a pea-sized amount onto finger and gently massage into skin on face, neck and decollete. Allow 2 minutes to penetrate.
book: 0491-Be Green Bath & Body Day Cream for Sensitive Combination Skin
